dcterms:description: VQA v2.0 is an updated version of VQA v1.0 that reduces data bias and contains question-image pairs collected from Microsoft COCO dataset, annotated with questions. It includes train, validation, and test sets with various types of questions.
dcterms:title: VQA v2.0

dcterms:creator: Kushal Kaﬂe
Christopher Kanan
dcterms:description: TDIUC is a dataset designed to analyze visual question answering algorithms, containing a large number of question-image pairs categorized into 12 different types of questions.
dcterms:title: TDIUC

dcterms:creator: Tsung-Yi Lin
Michael Maire
Serge Belongie
James Hays
Pietro Perona
Deva Ramanan
Piotr Doll´ar
C Lawrence Zitnick
dcterms:description: Microsoft COCO is a large-scale dataset that contains images with annotations for object detection, segmentation, and captioning, providing a rich context for visual question answering.
dcterms:title: Microsoft COCO

dcterms:creator: Justin Johnson
Bharath Hariharan
Laurens van der Maaten
Li Fei-Fei
C Lawrence Zitnick
Ross Girshick
dcterms:description: CLEVR is a diagnostic dataset designed for compositional language and elementary visual reasoning, featuring synthetic images and questions that require reasoning about the visual content.
dcterms:title: CLEVR
